author: schof
msg: A reset() method was needed for TreeWalker because before we were relying on creating new instances of TreeWalker every time we needed it.  Now that the model is in charge of managing it, the renderer should call reset when necessary.  Added a test case for the reset method in TreeWalkerBase as well.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-2078] Added <value>true</value> to profile activation for -DperformRelease system property in super-POM.

author: jdcasey
msg: [MNG-2030] Adding version output to the debugging log-level.
